entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
